scripts.docker:build: npm run build; docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t registry.gitlab.com/bostonscientific.com/io/base-images/re-docs:dev . --load
scripts.push:aws: helm template helm --values helm/values/dev_frontend.yaml --set imageTag=dev | kubectl apply -n radcals -f -
scripts.aws:rollout-restart: kubectl rollout restart deployment radcals-docs-dev-deployment -n radcals; kubectl rollout status deployment radcals-docs-dev-deployment --timeout=5m -n radcals
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run docker:build; npm run docker:push; npm run push:aws; npm run aws:rollout-restart
